channel.title: golang on 電波障害

item.title: Building a file parser
item.description: Last week, after reading this article - How to Write a Lexer in Go, I found that it is not so difficult to design a configuration file parser by this article’s mind-set. Then I tried to write a fluent-bit configuration parser, finally got this Fluent-Bit configuration parser for Golang.
